titles.title: A bill to modernize training programs at aviation maintenance technician schools.
A bill to modernize training programs at aviation maintenance technician schools.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
This bill directs the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to issue final regulations to modernize training programs at certain aviation maintenance technician schools.
The FAA shall ensure such training programs are revised and updated in correlation with aviation maintenance technician airman certification standards as necessary to reflect current technology and maintenance practices.
